urls.title: URLs to Monitor
urls.description: List of URLs to monitor for content changes. Use the Request List Sources editor to add URLs easily.

url.title: URL
url.description: The URL of the webpage to monitor

contentSelector.title: Content Selector
contentSelector.description: CSS selector for the content to monitor (e.g., '.main-content', '#article', 'article')

screenshotSelector.title: Screenshot Selector
screenshotSelector.description: CSS selector for screenshot capture (optional, defaults to contentSelector)

sendNotificationText.title: Notification Text
sendNotificationText.description: Custom text to include in notifications (optional)

sendNotificationTo.title: Email Address
sendNotificationTo.description: Email address to send notifications to when content changes

navigationTimeout.title: Navigation Timeout
navigationTimeout.description: Timeout for page navigation in milliseconds

maxRetries.title: Max Retries
maxRetries.description: Maximum number of retries for failed requests
